fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Stealing a player's wealth does the following things:
* First time: Roleblocks the player.
* Second time: Roleblocks the player and you learn their role.
* Third time: Roleblocks the player and you attack them.
* Fourth or more time: Roleblocks the player and deals a Rampage attack.
- Each time you steal someone's wealth, you gain an extra anonymous vote. These votes will accumulate.
- If the game would otherwise end, you may choose to block the game from ending. The town will not be told that you stopped the game from ending. However, if you die and Town wins, you will not win. **Does not trigger while dead.**
- Gain permanent Basic defense if the above attribute was triggered or if you are the final Town role. Also, you may choose to attack a player on your second theft instead of the third.
- Winning by yourself will grant you an extra reroll next game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Town goal. However, if the game ends with you as the last surviving Town, you win and all other Townies lose.
